name: Needle
description: A little pokey piece of metal, for poking things.

name: Spindle
description: A spinny thing that can be used to pull a material into yarn or thread.

name: Wool
description: The hair of a sheep.

name: Silk
description: Fibres of a silkworm cocoon.

name: Cotton
description: A soft, fluffy plant fiber.

name: Wool Thread
description: The hair of a sheep spun into thread. You'll need some kind of loom to turn it into fabric.
gatherString: You carefully pull the wool into thread.

name: Silk Thread
description: Fibres of a silkworm cocoon spun into thread. You'll need some kind of loom to turn it into fabric.
gatherString: You carefully pull the silk into thread.

name: Cotton Thread
description: A soft, fluffy plant fiber spun into thread. You'll need some kind of loom to turn it into fabric.
gatherString: You carefully pull the cotton into thread.

name: Baobhan Thread
description: Hair from a baobhan spun into thread. You'll need some kind of loom to turn it into fabric.
gatherString: You carefully pull the hair into thread.

name: Wool Fabric
description: The hair of a sheep spun into thread and woven into fabric.
gatherString: You carefully weave the thread into a fabric.

name: Silk Fabric
description: Fibres of a silkworm cocoon spun into thread and woven into fabric.
gatherString: You carefully weave the thread into a fabric.

name: Cotton Fabric
description: A soft, fluffy plant fiber spun into thread and woven into fabric.
gatherString: You carefully weave the thread into a fabric.

name: Baobhan Fabric
description: A soft, fluffy plant fiber spun into thread and woven into fabric.
gatherString: You carefully weave the thread into a fabric.

name: White Wool Cape
description: A white cape made from wool. It can protect your back, somewhat.

name: Red Wool Cape
description: A red cape made from wool. It can protect your back, somewhat.

name: Green Wool Cape
description: A green cape made from wool. It can protect your back, somewhat.

name: Blue Wool Cape
description: A blue cape made from wool. It can protect your back, somewhat.

name: Black Wool Cape
description: A black cape made from wool. It can protect your back, somewhat.

name: White Cotton Cape
description: A white cape made from cotton. It can protect your back, and it looks kinda cool.

name: White Silk Cape
description: A glorious white cape made from silk. It can protect your back, and it looks very cool.

name: Baobhan Cape
description: A cape made from the hair of a baobhan.

name: Madder Root
description: The roots of a madder plant. You could probably make dye with this somehow.

name: Red Dye
description: The roots of a madder plant dissolved in oil of vitriol.

name: Woad Leaves
description: The leaves of a woad plant. You could probably make dye with this somehow.

name: Blue Dye
description: The leaves of a woad plant soaked in water.

name: Green Dye
description: Chelonic powder soaked in water.

name: Fabrician's Gauntlet
description: By making it harder to work with textiles, you can learn more about the skill, faster!
